review:
I visited Smiles India Family Dentistry for the first time. Dr. D. Arunachalam is amazing and  so is his staff. They were extremely cooperative and caring.                    
Dr. D. Arunachalam  explained and guided me through the procedures *** *** **** ************** I felt very comfortable and confident in getting my treatment done. They used modern equipment and the facility was very clean.
I got my problem resolved in a single sitting and I was fully satisfied.
 Would highly recommend Dr.D. Arunachalam  and Smiles India Family Dentistry. Thank you Dr.
I am the customer for the past twenty years and his treatment and way of approach is excellent.** ***** **** *** *** **** ******* ** ******* ****

review:

I did not experience any pain in the process and he did a neat job. Even the crown fitting is done in such a way that I will not be able to understand the difference.
I recommend this doctor to all.

review:
There were 3 procedures done on 3 different sites on my teeth under conscious sedation. This involved a lot of examination (with state of the art equipment available and used with expertise in the clinic premises itself) and planning, not to forget medicines and reminderrs from the clinic to adhere to the schedule .
 Planning involved anaesthetist Dr Radika's  time , a very experienced doctor in this branch of medicine. 

This is written nearly a day after all these surgical procedures - extraction/ root canal/ implant preps and I am not in any discomfort at all, fell pretty good orally and physically.
Huge Thanks , Very friendly, supportive Drs and Staff ,
Keep smiling
